title: Game-Based Informal Music Learning: Competency Enhancement Through Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory (e.g., scales, rhythm) and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Learners autonomously explore music theory and practical skills through gamified elements, with a collaborative learning environment facilitated via mobile apps and online communities

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce at least three basic rhythm patterns using a music game app.
Learners can self-diagnose their performance level and develop improvement plans through the game's feedback system.
Learners can create a portfolio sharing game-based music learning experiences through online collaboration with peers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
